languages.text: "Твой язык мне подойдет, ксенос. Но предпочтительнее сердце".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Твой язык мне подойдет, ксенос. Но предпочтительнее сердце".
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Your own tongue will suit me just as well, xenos. Though I would prefer the heart."
languages.original_text: "Твой язык мне подойдет, ксенос. Но предпочтительнее сердце".

traits.locale_text: "Your own tongue will suit me fine, xenos. Though I would prefer the heart."
"Your own tongue will suit me fine, xenos. Though I would prefer the heart."
"Your own tongue will suit me just as well, xenos. Though I would prefer the heart."

"Your own tongue will suit me just as well, xenos. Though I would prefer the heart."

languages.text: "Eure eigene Zunge wäre mir genauso recht, Xenos. Obgleich ich das Herz bevorzugen würde."
languages.original_text: "Your own tongue will suit me just as well, xenos. Though I would prefer the heart."

traits.locale_text: "Eure eigene Zunge wäre mir genauso recht, Xenos. Obgleich ich das Herz bevorzugen würde."

languages.text: « Votre propre langue me conviendrait à merveille, xénos. Même si je préférerais votre cœur. »
languages.original_text: "Your own tongue will suit me just as well, xenos. Though I would prefer the heart."

traits.locale_text: « Votre propre langue me conviendrait à merveille, xénos. Même si je préférerais votre cœur. »

languages.text: “你的舌头也很适合，异形，不过我更喜欢心脏。”
languages.original_text: "Your own tongue will suit me just as well, xenos. Though I would prefer the heart."

traits.locale_text: “你的舌头也很适合，异形，不过我更喜欢心脏。”

languages.text: «Tu lengua me servirá también, xenos. Aunque preferiría tu corazón».
languages.original_text: "Your own tongue will suit me just as well, xenos. Though I would prefer the heart."

traits.locale_text: «Tu lengua me servirá también, xenos. Aunque preferiría tu corazón».

languages.text: 「異種族よ。お前の舌でもいいぞ。できれば心臓のほうがなおいいがな」
languages.original_text: "Your own tongue will suit me just as well, xenos. Though I would prefer the heart."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族よ。お前の舌でもいいぞ。できれば心臓のほうがなおいいがな」

languages.text: "Kendi dilin de işimi görür zeno. Gerçi kalbini tercih ederim."
languages.original_text: "Your own tongue will suit me just as well, xenos. Though I would prefer the heart."

traits.locale_text: "Kendi dilin de işimi görür zeno. Gerçi kalbini tercih ederim."
